title: Foldable 3 in 1 Wireless Charging Station for Apple Compatible with Magsafe Charger Stand,Magnetic Wireless Charger Station for iPhone 15 14 13 12 Series,Airpods Pro,Apple Watch Ultra (Pure Black) Carbon Black
description: 【3-in-1 Charging station for Apple Devices】This fast 3 in 1 magnetic wireless charger can power your iPhone,Apple watch and AirPods simultaneously. It'll fully charge iPhone 16 and Apple Watch S10 in just about 1.5-2.0 hours(other non-applle brand need 3.5 hours).The mag-safe charger stand only suitable for iPhone 16/15/14/13/12 series,for Apple watch S10/9/8/7/6/5/4/3/2/SE/Ultra 2, AirPods Pro,Airpods 2/3(with wireless charging case). Note: For optimal charging of this wireless charging station, please use the provided 18W USB-C wall charger.
top_reviews:
[{"id":"RPCBIJS6HLNGZ","title":"Charge me up, Scottie!","body":"This is a fantastic charging doc system!!! It was a gift for my mom and she loves it. The charging speed is a little slower than a regular type c or a lightening cable. But that is to be expected with wireless charging for any device. Once I knew my mom loved it, I bought one for the other family members. And it was a great decision. The magnet strength is perfectly fine, and you can charge AirPods, Apple Watch, and iPhone, all in one convenient place, a good value for money. I purchased the white because it looks very good and the color won’t wear off quickly. Read more","asin":"B0DK4VM1SX","body_html":"

In this case the company stood solidly behind their product and I would not hesitate to do business with them again.] There was a CLUNK in the middle of the night and I awoke to my iPhone laying face down on my nightstand. I have had this charger only three months and it has already fallen apart! If I could have contacted the seller directly with this problem I would have but that does not seem to be an option. I was enjoying this charger stand and it doesn’t otherwise seem to be a poorly crafted product, but if the glue doesn’t hold under normal/light use then other charger options would be a safer choice. [Update: the company has rectified the issue and did so in an expedient manner. I am updating my stars as I accept that some items of any product may have a flaw and that it depends on how the company responds to these issues on whether or not I would purchase from them again. In this case the company stood solidly behind their product and I would not hesitate to do business with them again.]

There was a CLUNK in the middle of the night and I awoke to my iPhone laying face down on my nightstand. At first I thought it may have slipped off the magnet but soon realized the magnetic coupler from the charging stand had become unglued. Ouch! I have had this charger only three months and it has already fallen apart!
If I could have contacted the seller directly with this problem I would have but that does not seem to be an option.
I was enjoying this charger stand and it doesn’t otherwise seem to be a poorly crafted product, but if the glue doesn’t hold under normal/light use then other charger options would be a safer choice.
Read more

I received a fast replacement and so far so good. I’ll update you on the charging and if the magnet strength holds up. Great customer service! Don’t waste your time purchasing this item, it will stop working in about a month. At first I loved the magnet strength and that my watch, AirPods, and phone all charged at once. Now, 29 days later, only 2 out of 3 charging stations work. At this rate, nothing will be working in another month or 2. Find something more durable or just stick with the charging cords your Apple accessories came with. Read more","asin":"B0DK4VM1SX","body_html":"
***Update***
I received a quick response after reading my review for this charging station. I received a fast replacement and so far so good. I’ll update you on the charging and if the magnet strength holds up. Great customer service!

Don’t waste your time purchasing this item, it will stop working in about a month. At first I loved the magnet strength and that my watch, AirPods, and phone all charged at once. Now, 29 days later, only 2 out of 3 charging stations work. At this rate, nothing will be working in another month or 2. Find something more durable or just stick with the charging cords your Apple accessories came with.

It’s very easy to use - Works great with not only my phone, but my watch and AirPods as well! I’ve traveled quite a few times with this, and I like that it folds down flat so it doesn’t take up much room in my luggage while not getting damaged. PERFECT design for those that travel and bring their chargers with them! When this one quits, I’ll definitely be buying another. I’m very impressed with this! I’ve been using this for two months now and I love it. The magnets perfectly hold everything in place so I can listen to my crime shows as I go to sleep at night and my phone is still upright and safely charging.

It’s very easy to use - Works great with not only my phone, but my watch and AirPods as well!

I’ve traveled quite a few times with this, and I like that it folds down flat so it doesn’t take up much room in my luggage while not getting damaged. PERFECT design for those that travel and bring their chargers with them!

When this one quits, I’ll definitely be buying another. I’m very impressed with this!
Read more
